presetName.description: If the answer was given by a preset, mark it as such, so we can replace it with another preset's value.

data.description: When the quesion is selected, the data contains the text that is added to the specification document.

description.description:
Optional descriptive text, shown under the question. In case of an array, each string is
treated as a paragraph.

id.description:
Unique identifier: in case the question has a parent, e.g. in a yes/no question,
its ID is combined with the parent ID to create a unique ID. E.g. if the parent
ID = 1, and the sub-question is ID = 'a', you can refer to it as '1a'.

index.description: Internal property. When duplicating questions, index refers to the duplication index, e.g. 0 is the first, etc.

mandatory.description: When true, mark the question as mandatory.

output.description: When the question is answered, the corresponding output is added to the report.

repeat.description:
By default, repeat is 0. In case it is 1 or more, it means that we can repeat
(and delete) the question or group.
In case of a string, the resolved value should be a number too.

show.description:
By default, show every question, except when this property is defined. In that case, show when:
- show is a string with a questionID, and questionID is selected (as an answer)
- show is a string array, and one of the questionIDs is selected [OR condition]
When the string contains commas, separating questionIDs, only
show it when all of these questions have been selected.

title.description:
Text that is shown in simple cases.
In more complicated cases, it may contain data annotations, e.g.
- "Give me your name: _name_?"" is converted to a string with input textbox.
   The entered name is stored in the answer.
- In "&id.name, how old are your?: _age_", the name is replaced with the entered name, and the age is captured.

In case the attached data object already contains a name or age property, its value is copied,
and its type is used to determine the input type (e.g. if it is a string, use text input).

mandatory.description: When true, mark the question as mandatory.

output.description: When the question is answered, the corresponding output is added to the report.

presets.description: When used, some or all (unanswered) questions are prefilled

(and delete) the question or group.

- show is a string array, and one of the questionIDs is selected [OR condition]
When the string contains commas, separating questionIDs, only
show it when all of these questions have been selected.

IData.description: Attached data, e.g. for generating output or creating a table, etc.

classNames.description: Classes that you wish to attach to a question, e.g. "col s12 m6 l4 xl3" to specify the size.

max.description: When input type is a number, optionally specify the maximum value.

maxLength.description: When input type is a text or text area, optionally specify the maximum length.

min.description: When input type is a number, optionally specify the minimum value.

minLength.description: When input type is a text or text area, optionally specify the minimum length.

presets.description:
Optional list of answers that must be set when the question is selected.
If value is not supplied, the default (true) is used.

created.description: Enables basic storage and retrieval of dates and times.

updated.description: Enables basic storage and retrieval of dates and times.

IOption.description: Question with multiple options (more can be checked)

text.description: In case the ID refers to an open question, you can add here open text.

and.description: In a list, how to display a, b, AND c

deleteLocalStorageLabel.description: How to name the delete local storage button

downloadJsonFilename.description: What is the name of the JSON download file

downloadJsonLabel.description: How to name the JSON download button

downloadMarkdownFilename.description: What is the name of the Markdown download file

downloadMarkdownLabel.description: How to name the markdown download button

emptySpecMessage.description: When there is no specification, what message do you want to display

nextLabel.description: Label for navigation to the next page

prevLabel.description: Label for navigation to the previous page

showTemplateSelector.description: When true, show the dropdown selector to switch between different examples.

uploadTemplateLabel.description: How to name the upload button

uploadTooltipLabel.description: Message to show when you hover above the upload area

introduction.description: Welcome text on the home page

specificationInfo.description: Information about the current version of the document

templateInfo.description: Information about the template you are currently editing
